Technical Support Engineer - German SpeakerJob Description

We are looking for an EMEA Technical Support Specialist - German speaker.

He/she Will Be In Charge Of
  • Provide world class Technical Support to our customers, partners and colleagues on our range of ADC products (HHS, MOB, FRS).
  • Support in particular our range of Hand Held Scanners (tipically connected via Bluetooth, Radio frequency, cable, wi-fi) and rugged mobile computers typically connected via WLAN or WAN to communicate with various business applications.
  • Be a consistent reference for any technical issues concerning DL products that may arise, taking ownership of issues and leveraging all required resources to resolve the issue. This will mainly be remotely by phone, email and remote collaboration tools, but will also require some on-site visits.
  • Work as part of a team but able to work on own initiative, requires organization, flexibility, excellent communication skills and the ability to prioritize the workload. Keeping track of activities using our MS Dynamics CRM is mandatory as is the ability to provide training to colleagues, partners and customers and it is essential to escalate any design, reliability and other problems or bugs to design engineering/software engineering/BPI leveraging the CRM to do so.

Languages: German language Fluent is a MUST

Who We Are:

Empirix is a leading provider of customer-centric business solutions. We provide a unified view of end-to-end user behavior and communications across networks. Service providers and enterprises worldwide rely on Empirix to accelerate new revenue, while optimizing operational costs, user experience, and customer loyalty. Our innovative solutions portfolio delivers business analytics, proactive testing, and monitoring to transform customer, network, and service behaviors into real-time actionable intelligence.

The Role

We are seeking for a talented and motivated Software Engineer who can work with limited supervision on the development of monitoring applications on Wireline and Wireless Networks Protocols and in particular on Radio Access and Core networks protocol interfaces.

Development is primarily on C/C++ under Linux OS physical and virtual environments.

Other responsibilities include:

  • Design of software infrastructure applications
  • Source Code development, debugging and testing.
  • Analyze complex issues and deploy appropriate solutions
  • Availability to travel 20%

\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Required Skills:

  • Master Degree in Computer Science, Electronic/Telecommunication Engineering
  • Knowledge of networking protocols (IP/UDP/TCP/SCTP)
  • Knowledge of Mobile network technologies (2G, 3G, 4G, 5G)
  • Solid programming in C/C++, Unix Shell scripting (Bash), Python
  • Strong background developing highly-scalable, high-performing and multi-threaded applications
  • Strong knowledge of Linux OS
  • Agile and DevOps software development methodologies
  • Strong attitude in team working
  • Curiosity and innovative in facing challenges
  • Fluent in English

\xc2\xa0Bonus if you have:\xc2\xa0
